ygData.subject: RE: Something about a gnome in Rathe Mtns....
ygData.msgSnippet: I m going down there to check with an enchanter. I can max my faction with anyone so I ll hail everyone and such. If anyone could tell me how to get there from
ygData.messageBody:
I'm going down there to check with an enchanter. I can max my faction with
anyone so I'll hail everyone and such.
If anyone could tell me how to get there from the entrace to sola it would
be a big help.




-Dave

At 11:13 AM 12/6/99 -0800, you wrote:
>From: Ken Jordan <kjordan@...>
>
>I'll head down to Sol A tonight... I know that place like the back of my had
>after spending almost a month down there getting various items for
>guildmates. I'll let everyone know if I find anything, however, I was down
>there a while back after the patch and didn't see any new spawns in the
>Gnome Castle but I'll check again.
>
>Zindabus - 18 Gnome Warrior
>aka
>Darkadvent - 50 DE Cleric
>Cazic-Thule
>
